name: Siren Head SCP Forest Monster
description:
Story :
A friend of my mine, named "Josh" was very sad yesterday. I tried to make him calm down, but he said that he wanted to do something crazy to make the pain go away. Now he's been missing the whole day! He might have gone into the forest. I have heard some bad rumors about that place! Rumors about a creepy monster in that Forest. His head is made of siren, and everyone gets sick of it. Only few people survived that place.

In-Game Features :
- Complex escape routes
- Difficult Siren head monster
- Intense atmosphere and scary environment
- Rampid puzzles and adventure modes

Consider to rate the game if you enjoyed it.
